reviews.text: 1411 E Lookout Dr Ste 150, Richardson, TX 75082 Closes soon · 4 PM · Opens 8 AM Tue Give the gift that makes home feel like a getaway. Universal Screens helps you enjoy the view in comfort all year long. Find a dealer near you. #universalscreens #motorizedscreens #outdoorliving #patioinspiration #customdesign Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. Our Universal Screen is only about 2 years old and one of them is already broken.  Our salesperson, Larry (Nextgen Multimedia) we cannot reach.  Either his voicemail is full or if you happen  to be able to leave a message he never calls … More

Incredible motorized screen manufacturer.  We have been working with Universal Screens since 2013.  They offer the best on the market motorized retractable screens and now a manual retractable shade introduced in 2018.  We proudly install … More
For exterior motorized shades, I highly recommend Universal Screens. They have quality products and great customer service. Response from the owner a year ago
